You tell us!By Bon AppétitJanuary 31, 2018FacebookTwitterEmailFacebookTwitterEmailDo you have the best brownies in all the land? Are you famous for your chicken cacciatore? We want to spread the word!In April, we're excited to feature several reader-created recipes on the site (those cookies pictured above came from reader Kate Davis last year and we're obsessed).Here's where to share your recipe:Email staff.bonappetit@gmail.com with your original recipe by February 15. And tell us a little about it—is it a signature dish of yours? Something that was passed down over the generations? We want the backstory! And we want to know why it tastes really good. This should be a recipe that's accessible to home cooks, not a multi-day project.Once we select the winners, the Test Kitchen will get busy cooking through the recipes, which means that we may make some small modifications. Then, we'll photograph the dish and feature it on the site, on our social media channels, and in our newsletter.We'll be in touch with the winners—sorry in advance that we cannot respond to all inquiries. Please limit submissions to two recipes max. Can't wait to see what you've got!For fine print and full contest rules, see here.Recipes you want to make. Cooking advice that works.
